title: Airlines are waiving fees ahead of this weekend’s storm
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights Find out what your airline is doing in response to the upcoming winter storm.
Travelers check in at a Delta kiosk at Boston Logan International Airport in Boston.

JOSEPH PREZIOSO By Kristi Palma January 23, 2026 | 7:45 AM 2 minutes to read Airlines are allowing itinerary changes for travelers arriving and departing from Boston ahead of what is being called a significant winter storm.

title: Bruins’ Charlie McAvoy voices support for LGBTQ+ hockey community, ‘Heated Rivalry’
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "It's the least that we can do to show our support and show that we’re all on the same team.
” Charlie McAvoy believes that hockey is becoming more welcoming to all communities.

title: Somerville city officials issue drug warning after 5 reported overdoses, 3 of them fatal
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News Officials warned residents about a possible “bad batch” of drugs and provided information about health resources.
Somerville city officials issued a drug warning after a spike in overdoses over the weekend.
Pat Greenhouse/The Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Brookline restaurant, wine store closed indefinitely after fire
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The two businesses each announced in Instagram posts that they will be closed until further notice due to the fire.
Painted Burro Brookline was damaged in a fire last week (Harvard Square branch seen here).
Lane Turner/The Boston Globe Two Brookline businesses have closed indefinitely after a fire broke out last week in one of the buildings and spread to the other.

title: Patriots legend named honorary captain ahead of AFC title game
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Adam Vinatieri won three Super Bowls in 10 seasons with the Patriots.
Adam Vinatieri won three Super Bowls during his 10 years with the Patriots.
Jim Davis / The Boston Globe The New England Patriots will have an old friend out on the field in Denver for Sunday’s AFC championship game against the Broncos.

title: Victim of fatal Oakham house fire identified, accidental factors under investigation
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News Officials say investigators found a space heater and other possible ignition sources where the fatal fire began.
Investigators are looking into accidental factors in an Oakham fire that claimed a man's life Wednesday.
Department of Fire Services Investigators are examining accidental factors in an Oakham fire that claimed a man’s life and destroyed his home Wednesday.
